token.aboutMe1: Hello, my name is Dmytro and I am passionate about creating websites. I got interested in programming when I was a kid. I found a C tutorial that had an example of a «Hello, world!» program that outputted this text to the terminal, and at that moment, I was completely hooked on the world of computers.
token.aboutMe2: Over the years I've cultivated my passion for programming and during that time I've had a bumpy road working in IT in various roles, but I've always dreamed of working in web development, so over the years I've learned more and practiced creating web pages for using such technologies as HTML, CSS and, of course, JavaScript.
token.aboutMe3: I am incredibly passionate about the world of web development and the beauty of creating useful websites, I am constantly improving myself in this direction and learning something new every day. I am currently looking for a junior developer position to finally start my career and learn from professionals.
token.servicesDesc: I am a hard-working and quality-oriented Junior Front-end Developer looking for an entry-level position with a company to use my skills in programming, solving complex problems and helping to complete projects on time.
token.web: I create web pages that look good on all devices. Your site will look good on all types of devices (desktops, tablets and phones).
token.dev: I develop websites from simple one-page landing pages to complex multi-page corporate websites.
token.cms: I create sites for Wordpress. What I like about Wordpress is that you can create a professional looking website with tons of functionality without breaking the bank.
token.maintenance: I am engaged in the maintenance of the website and tasks related to its support, proper and up-to-date functioning and appearance.
token.message: Send me your message or details of the project you'd like me to be involved in and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
token.descr: AGAMI Dentistry is a leading clinic in Kharkiv
token.Ім'я та прізвище має містити тільки букв: Name and surname must contain only letters
token.jolly-designs: Jolly Designs is a company that specializes in high-quality books, educational toys and accessories for children.
